page.title: 01THE LANDSCAPE.
page.content: {The landscape}of this area is one of contrasts. The northern part of this block is the western limit of the Mendip hills. The southern section is low land only just above sea level. The villages of Cross, Lower Weare and the town of Axbridge are found in this survey block. {The low land}is lush and green. The drainage has been much improved and in addition to dairy farming corn is now being grown. When you look out across this area you can see a criss_cross of droves and drainage channels. {The northern area}by contrast is not as green or lush the land being mostly rough grazing and scrub. Topics to be covered in the following pages include:{T.V. THE CHURCH, MUSIC, {FASHION, LEISURE, SPORT, CLUBS, SCHOOL {LIFE,FOOD, CHEDDAR RESERVOIR, TOURISM, {TRANSPORT and BUILDINGS.
